009package Ch12_RansacAndHough;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
013import imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils;
014import imagingbook.core.resource.ImageResource;
015import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
016
017/**
018 * Hough line detection demo. Opens a local sample image and then runs
019 * plugin {@link Hough_Lines_Detect}.
020 * 
021 * @author WB
022 *
023 */
024public class Hough_Lines_Demo implements PlugIn {
025        
026        private static ImageResource resource = GeneralSampleImage.NoisyLines;
027
028        @Override
029        public void run(String arg) {
030                
031                ImagePlus im = resource.getImage();
032                im.show();
033                
034                IjUtils.run(new Hough_Lines_Detect());
035                im.close();
036        }
037
038}
